attributes.action: ignore the constant semi-literate petitions from J Richards because most are nonsense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Looking through the hundreds of petitions from J Richards, he/she is evidently from Barnes Ave, Fearnhead, Warrington. This person is clearly unemployed because he/she rambles about being harassed by the Job Centre. J Richards appears to while away the hours by misusing this site with infantile and inappropriate petitions (e.g. park benches, intrusive neighbours, threatening to send the 'brothers', etc.). This is an abuse of democratic rights.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
